name: json-post
description: How to post JSON in NodeJS

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/index.js && echo 'module.exports = postJSON;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/index.js && echo 'export default postJSON;' >> esm/index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
